title: In the Bad Boy's Bed
description: The company that published this book went out of business, and the rights reverted back to me. I revised it significantly. Some of the changes I made:* fine-tuned the entire book* added new scenes* added many more sex scenes* lengthened the entire story* changed the name to Dirty Little Secret* published the book with The Wild Rose Presshttp://www.amazon.com/Dirty-Little-Se...
author: Sophia  Ryan
